= Process =

== Format ==
cg process_sample sampledir destdir dbdir ?force?

== Summary ==
Convert Complete Genomics data to cg format

== Description ==
processes (sorting annotating, etc.) one Complete Genomics sample directory, and writes
the adapted data into destdir. By default, only files that are not present already will be created."

== Arguments ==
; **sampledir**: data directory as it comes from Complete Genomics
; **destdir**: data directory to be created, containing data in the cg format
; **dbdir**: database directory with reference sequence, etc.
; **force**: When force is given as a parameter, everything will be recalculated and overwritten."

== Category ==
Conversion
